verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> These [are] now the chief אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֑ם <S%H3187><s%> and [this is] the genealogy הָעֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> of them that went up עִמִּ֗י <S%H5973><s%> in בְּמַלְכ֛וּת <S%H4438><s%> in the reign אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> with me from Babylon ס

מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons פִֽינְחָס֙ <S%H6372><s%> of Phinehas גֵּֽרְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H1647><s%> Gershom ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons דָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H2407><s%> Hattush ס

מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֔ה <S%H7935><s%> of Shechaniah ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons פַרְעֹ֖שׁ <S%H6551><s%> of Pharosh זְכַרְיָ֑ה <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah וְעִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> accompanying הִתְיַחֵ֥שׂ <S%H3187><s%> and with him were reckoned by genealogy לִזְכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> of the males מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> and fifty ס

מִבְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H6355><s%> of Pahathmoab אֶלְיְהֽוֹעֵינַ֖י <S%H454><s%> Elihoenai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <S%H2228><s%> of Zerahiah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> and with him two hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7935><s%> of Shechaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יַחֲזִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3166><s%> of Jahaziel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and with him three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons עָדִ֔ין <S%H5720><s%> also of Adin עֶ֖בֶד <S%H5651><s%> Ebed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹנָתָ֑ן <S%H3129><s%> of Jonathan וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and with him fifty הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <S%H3470><s%> Jeshaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲתַלְיָ֑ה <S%H6271><s%> of Athaliah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> and with him seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> of Shephatiah זְבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H2069><s%> Zebadiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִֽיכָאֵ֑ל <S%H4317><s%> of Michael וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and with him fourscore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> of Joab עֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> Obadiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְחִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3171><s%> of Jehiel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> two מָאתַ֛יִם <S%H3967><s%> and with him two hundred וּשְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons שְׁלוֹמִ֖ית <S%H8019><s%> of Shelomith בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹסִפְיָ֑ה <S%H3131><s%> of Josiphiah וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> and with him an hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons בֵבַ֔י <S%H893><s%> of Bebai זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֵּבָ֑י <S%H893><s%> of Bebai וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and with him twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And of the sons עַזְגָּ֔ד <S%H5803><s%> of Azgad יוֹחָנָ֖ן <S%H3110><s%> Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַקָּטָ֑ן <S%H6997><s%> of Hakkatan וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> and with him an hundred וַעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> and ten הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲדֹנִיקָם֮ <S%H140><s%> of Adonikam אַחֲרֹנִים֒ <S%H314><s%> And of the last וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> those שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> whose names אֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <S%H467><s%> [are] these Eliphelet יְעִיאֵ֣ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel וּֽשְׁמַעְיָ֑ה <S%H8098><s%> and Shemaiah וְעִמָּהֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> and with them threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons בִגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> also of Bigvai עוּתַ֣י <S%H5793><s%> Uthai [וְזָבוּד כ] (וְזַכּ֑וּר <S%H2072><s%> Zabbud ק) וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> and with them seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> males פ

וָֽאֶקְבְּצֵ֗ם <S%H6908><s%> And I gathered them together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> to the river הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> that runneth אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲוָ֔א <S%H163><s%> to Ahava וַנַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H2583><s%> and there abode we in tents שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> where יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <S%H7969><s%> three וָאָבִ֤ינָה <S%H995><s%> and I viewed בָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people וּבַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> there none of the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> and found שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֡ה <S%H7971><s%> Then sent לֶאֱלִיעֶ֡זֶר <S%H461><s%> I for Eliezer לַאֲרִיאֵ֡ל <S%H740><s%> for Ariel לִֽ֠שְׁמַעְיָה <S%H8098><s%> for Shemaiah וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֨ן <S%H494><s%> and for Elnathan וּלְיָרִ֜יב <S%H3402><s%> and for Jarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֧ן <S%H494><s%> and for Elnathan וּלְנָתָ֛ן <S%H5416><s%> and for Nathan וְלִזְכַרְיָ֥ה <S%H2148><s%> and for Zechariah וְלִמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> and for Meshullam רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> chief men וּלְיוֹיָרִ֥יב <S%H3114><s%> also for Joiarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֖ן <S%H494><s%> and for Elnathan מְבִינִֽים׃ <S%H995><s%> men of understanding

[וָאֹוצִאָה כ] (וָאֲצַוֶּ֤ה <S%H3318><s%> after ק) אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אִדּ֣וֹ <S%H112><s%> unto Iddo הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief בְּכָסִפְיָ֖א <S%H3703><s%> Casiphia הַמָּק֑וֹם <S%H4725><s%> at the place וָאָשִׂימָה֩ <S%H7760><s%> appoint בְּפִיהֶ֨ם <S%H6310><s%> according דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> them what לְ֠דַבֵּר <S%H1696><s%> they should say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִדּ֨וֹ <S%H112><s%> unto Iddo אָחִ֤יו <S%H251><s%> [and] to his brethren [הַנְּתוּנִים כ] (הַנְּתִינִים֙ <S%H5411><s%> Nethinims ק) בְּכָסִפְיָ֣א <S%H3703><s%> Casiphia הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> at the place לְהָֽבִיא־ <S%H935><s%> that they should bring לָ֥נוּ מְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <S%H8334><s%> unto us ministers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God

וַיָּבִ֨יאּוּ <S%H935><s%> upon us they brought לָ֜נוּ כְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אֱלֹהֵ֨ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God הַטּוֹבָ֤ה <S%H2896><s%> And by the good עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> us a man שֶׂ֔כֶל <S%H7922><s%> of understanding מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מַחְלִ֔י <S%H4249><s%> of Mahli בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְשֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֛ה <S%H8274><s%> and Sherebiah וּבָנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> with his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> And Hashabiah וְאִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> for יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <S%H3470><s%> and with him Jeshaiah מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari אֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> and their sons עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> twenty ס

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <S%H5411><s%> Also of the Nethinims שֶׁנָּתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> had appointed דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> whom David וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> and the princes לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites נְתִינִ֖ים <S%H5411><s%> Nethinims מָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֑ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all נִקְּב֥וּ <S%H5344><s%> all of them were expressed בְשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8034><s%> by name

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> Then I proclaimed שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there צוֹם֙ <S%H6685><s%> a fast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at הַנָּהָ֣ר <S%H5104><s%> there at the river אַהֲוָ֔א <S%H163><s%> of Ahava לְהִתְעַנּ֖וֹת <S%H6031><s%> that we might afflict לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> ourselves before אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way יְשָׁרָ֔ה <S%H3477><s%> of him a right לָ֥נוּ וּלְטַפֵּ֖נוּ <S%H2945><s%> for us and for our little ones וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רְכוּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H7399><s%> and for all our substance

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because בֹ֗שְׁתִּי <S%H954><s%> For I was ashamed לִשְׁא֤וֹל <S%H7592><s%> to require מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> a band of soldiers וּפָרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen לְעָזְרֵ֥נוּ <S%H5826><s%> to help מֵאוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> us against the enemy בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אָמַ֨רְנוּ <S%H559><s%> because we had spoken לַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> The hand אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מְבַקְשָׁיו֙ <S%H1245><s%> that seek לְטוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] upon all them for good וְעֻזּ֣וֹ <S%H5797><s%> him but his power וְאַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> and his wrath עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> are against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹזְבָֽיו׃ <S%H5800><s%> [is] against all them that forsake

וַנָּצ֛וּמָה <S%H6684><s%> So we fasted וַנְּבַקְשָׁ֥ה <S%H1245><s%> and besought מֵאֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַיֵּעָתֵ֖ר <S%H6279><s%> for this and he was intreated לָֽנוּ׃

וָאַבְדִּ֛ילָה <S%H914><s%> Then I separated מִשָּׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> of the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֑ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לְשֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֣ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah וְעִמָּהֶ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> with מֵאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> of their brethren עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H6235><s%> and ten

[וָאֶשְׁקֹולָה כ] (וָאֶשְׁקֳלָ֣ה <S%H8254><s%> pay ק) לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> unto them the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֵּלִ֑ים <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> [even] the offering בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God הַהֵרִ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7311><s%> had offered הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> which the king וְיֹעֲצָ֣יו <S%H3289><s%> and his counsellors וְשָׂרָ֔יו <S%H8269><s%> and his lords וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel הַנִּמְצָאִֽים׃ <S%H4672><s%> [there] present

וָאֶשְׁקֲלָ֨ה <S%H8254><s%> I even weighed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדָ֜ם <S%H3027><s%> unto their hand כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver כִּכָּרִים֙ <S%H3603><s%> talents שֵֽׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֔ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessels כֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred לְכִכָּרִ֑ים <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> [and] of gold מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred כִכָּֽר׃ <S%H3603><s%> talents

וּכְפֹרֵ֤י <S%H3713><s%> basons זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> of gold עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> Also twenty לַאֲדַרְכֹנִ֖ים <S%H150><s%> drams אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> of a thousand וּכְלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> vessels נְחֹ֜שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> copper מֻצְהָ֤ב <S%H6668><s%> shiny טוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> of fine שְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two חֲמוּדֹ֖ת <S%H2532><s%> precious כַּזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> as gold

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> And I said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> You קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> unto them Ye [are] holy לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהַכֵּלִ֖ים <S%H3627><s%> the vessels קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [are] holy וְהַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> also and the silver וְהַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and the gold נְדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> [are] a freewill offering לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of your fathers

שִׁקְד֣וּ <S%H8245><s%> Watch וְשִׁמְר֗וּ <S%H8104><s%> ye and keep עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תִּשְׁקְל֡וּ <S%H8254><s%> [them] until ye weigh לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> [them] before שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וְשָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> and chief הָאָב֥וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem הַלִּשְׁכ֖וֹת <S%H3957><s%> in the chambers בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְקִבְּלוּ֙ <S%H6901><s%> So took הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites מִשְׁקַ֛ל <S%H4948><s%> the weight הַכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of the silver וְהַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְהַכֵּלִ֑ים <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels לְהָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> to bring לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> [them] to Jerusalem לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God פ

וַֽנִּסְעָ֞ה <S%H5265><s%> Then we departed מִנְּהַ֣ר <S%H5104><s%> from the river אַֽהֲוָ֗א <S%H163><s%> of Ahava בִּשְׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and the hand אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> of our God הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> was over וַיַּ֨צִּילֵ֔נוּ <S%H5337><s%> was upon us and he delivered מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> us from the hand אוֹיֵ֛ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy וְאוֹרֵ֖ב <S%H693><s%> and of such as lay in wait עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> by the way

וַנָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> And we came יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וַנֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and abode שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> there three

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרְבִיעִ֡י <S%H7243><s%> Now on the fourth נִשְׁקַ֣ל <S%H8254><s%> weighed הַכֶּסֶף֩ <S%H3701><s%> was the silver וְהַזָּהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְהַכֵּלִ֜ים <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God עַ֠ל <S%H5921><s%> into יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מְרֵמ֤וֹת <S%H4822><s%> of Meremoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֽוּרִיָּה֙ <S%H223><s%> of Uriah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and with אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> and with him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פִּֽינְחָ֑ס <S%H6372><s%> of Phinehas וְעִמָּהֶ֞ם <S%H5973><s%> with יוֹזָבָ֧ד <S%H3107><s%> and with them [was] Jozabad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֵשׁ֛וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua וְנֽוֹעַדְיָ֥ה <S%H5129><s%> and Noadiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּנּ֖וּי <S%H1131><s%> of Binnui הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> Levites

בְּמִסְפָּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> By number בְּמִשְׁקָ֖ל <S%H4948><s%> [and] by weight לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> Everything וַיִּכָּתֵ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> was written כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמִּשְׁקָ֖ל <S%H4948><s%> of every one and all the weight בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ

הַ֠בָּאִים <S%H935><s%> which were come out מֵֽהַשְּׁבִ֨י <S%H7628><s%> of the captivity בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Also] the children הַגּוֹלָ֜ה <S%H1473><s%> of those that had been carried away הִקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> offered עֹל֣וֹת ׀ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פָּרִ֨ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֤ר <S%H6240><s%> ten עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel אֵילִ֣ים ׀ <S%H352><s%> rams תִּשְׁעִ֣ים <S%H8673><s%> ninety וְשִׁשָּׁ֗ה <S%H8337><s%> and six כְּבָשִׂים֙ <S%H3532><s%> lambs שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וְשִׁבְעָ֔ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven צְפִירֵ֥י <S%H6842><s%> he goats חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֑ר <S%H6240><s%> ten הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עוֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> all [this was] a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ

וַֽיִּתְּנ֣וּ ׀ <S%H5414><s%> And they delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּתֵ֣י <S%H1881><s%> commissions הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's לַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנֵי֙ <S%H323><s%> lieutenants הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's וּפַחֲו֖וֹת <S%H6346><s%> and to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וְנִשְּׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they furthered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> and the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God ס
